content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties referred to as the applicant and the defendant the court determined that certain items such as a bed mattress tv set washing machine fridge sofa corner sectional sofa and microwave oven should be jointly owned by both parties however specific items were awarded to each party the court ordered the applicant to compensate the defendant with eur 80 for a fair share of movable property the text also mentions that the applicant has filed for a divorce and is seeking various rights and compensation including maintenance for their minor daughter the defendant has filed a defense and counterclaim the court will determine the division of property obligations towards the bank and compensation the costs of the proceedings will be divided between the parties
